name: My Memory :: Brain Game
description:
How good is your memory?

You can testing and training your memory with amusing.

My Memory is a game where you match several images made up of a pair.

✔️ Simple design
✔️ Cute images
✔️ 4 modes
✔️ 12 difficulty levels
✔️ For everyone
✔️ 12 languages supported

Open source used:
https://github.com/material-components
https://github.com/hfg-gmuend/openmoji

Please let us know in the comments what was translated incorrectly.
My skills are not good. 😁
Alternatively, you can improve your translation by participating in the POEditor project.
https://poeditor.com/join/project?hash=tGh4K3qK30
